3: I can't believe this Corrupted's memory shell data is encrypted... And in a way I've never seen before too...
Its attack mode has been redesigned before manufacturing too...
These designs... are all 'efforts' of the Punishing Virus to destroy humanity?
I sometimes wonder if the Punishing Virus is sentient or not, but these speculations are meaningless...
Come out.
We know you secretly helped us take care of some enemies.
Oh! Nanami got found!
Since you found me, I'll just operate together with you guys!
Then give us something to let us know that we can trust you!
Alright, alright. Nanami facts time! Fact number one, Nanami is not human!
Here you go again...
Hmph, you're still questioning Nanami! Nanami's shocked!
Alright, I'll tell you guys more!
Nanami fact number two, Nanami is currently curious about one specific human!
That reminds Nanami, there are a lot of things on your body that Nanami is curious about!
Commandant here is the incarnation of the unfathomable, you sure you want to know more about them?
Huh—What'd you say? I heard you say, 'Nanami must help us destroy the enemy before we give her information on the Gray Raven Commandant.'
Hmm, it's not a fair bargain to Nanami... But I'll still accept it!
That's not what I said at all...
Everyone, the next wave of Corrupted is coming!
Oh, speak of the Corrupted! This way!
Wait, you're going in alone?!
Don't worry, don't worry! Nanami promised to take care of them!
